website_summaries.verdict: An excellent heated cat house for outside that is safe, effective, and water resistant. It’s also incredibly adorable.
pros: Heated pet mat features chew-resistant cord
Also includes a 13 ft. extension cord
Plug-in timer allows for safer operation and can save on energy bills
2 doors make it easy for pets to come and go
Accommodates cats and dogs under 25 lb
cons: Timer is only for indoor use
Not heavy enough to hold up to strong winds

website_summaries.verdict: This adorable cat house is perfect for outdoor cats.
pros: When placed under a porch or awning, this cat house can be used with the included heating pad outdoors for your own cats or for strays
The fabric is water resistant, and the cable is generously long at 13 feet
cons: Rain will get through the roof

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase on Amazon yet
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best thing we have purchased on Amazon yet. The thought that went into making this house is amazing. The people who made this thought of everything. It's durable, easy to put together, it has two openings which if anyone knows cats especially feral ones they need two openings if they want to go inside something and it heats up. What's not to love? This was something we were able to purchase because it wasn't too expensive and now we get to help a homeless Kitty stay warm for the winter. You guys rock
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install. I have one outdoor kitty and one half indoor/outdoor. I placed this on an outdoor couch right outside our back door, underneath our patio covering. My cat loved it. He went right in and won’t come out. Lol Normally he’ll run to me when I come outside, but he will not budge. He turned into a loaf inside there. The pad heats up quickly. This is such a relief, I was so worried with temps dropping and the rains coming. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Halo0319

customer_reviews.title: Great pet house.
customer_reviews.text: A neighbor moved away and left two beautiful cats. They have now made their home with me. As the weather turned colder, I worried about then being outside with no more protection than a cardboard box. The heated house is perfect for them. I keep it on my porch. I have actually ordered another one so they can both have their own space. It is made well, durable, and really cute!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ring

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor Cats
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to setup without instructions! Everything is attached with strong velcro and the house is really sturdy. I'm only giving it 4 stars because my cats actually didn't care for it for some reason (they are indoor and outdoor cats), but if I was a cat I would totally use it! At first, I thought maybe it was the plastic doorways that they couldn't go through or were afraid of, but I took them out easily and tried to get them to go in and they just went right through it and didn't care for it. Maybe it was too fancy for them and they just prefer the cardboard house with the scratch pad.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: Like the house!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the house were more waterproof and what's with the indoor timer (should be outdoor)? But it definitely serves the purpose! My neighbors have an old cat they keep outside and it hurt my heart to see him outside. I bought the house for him and I am very happy to have him greet me every morning for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Insulated floor and timer are an added bonus.
customer_reviews.text: I just received 2 of these houses. I bought them for the stray cats that I feed outside. They are easy to put together and so adorable! They came with timers and insulated floors which are awesome for the price. I’ll post an update after I set them up outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Boone

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and then some!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Packaged beautifully. Has everything you need and more in package. House is spacious, heated mat is soft fleece, entrance and exit with or without flaps out on. Super easy assembly. Can’t say enough good about this product. My cats adore it. Hope to buy more in the future. My small dogs would love to. 👍
customer_reviews.author: baps

customer_reviews.title: Good pet house for small animal
customer_reviews.text: Nice pet house for a cat or small dog. Easy to assemble. Comes with timer for the heating pad. The cord I’d very long.
customer_reviews.author: dspowell

customer_reviews.title: Not good or outside
customer_reviews.text: Rained and the inside was sopping wet. Not weather proof at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Stephan

customer_reviews.title: She’s loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Mittens won’t come in the house anymore because of the dogs! We used to joke that she moved out, until we realized she had torn up some ductwork under the house to create a warm spot. We Needed a solution to give her a warm place. This seemed perfect. It took a little coaxing to get her in it. But once she realized that it was warm inside, she’s loving it. Now we can get the ductwork replaced and get our heat back!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Cord Issue
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and opened it. Looks great but I can’t get the plug to go through the opening of the house.... it won’t fit 😔 Other than that it’s amazing and our cats love them. Hoping they last.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy and weatherproof little cat house
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cat house. It is a warm place for our kitty to lay when he goes outside and I dont need to worry that he is cold. I am so glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A CAT HOUSE IT'S  A CAT CANOPY!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions at all, This item has two walls a roof and a floor pad (I think) it also comes with a heating pad. Unless you live in miami beach during the winter this will never keep a cat warm. With no wind it would keep a cat dry with two wide open walls this has a snowball's chance in hell at keeping a cat warm. Just wanted to let everyone know this is just a roof with two walls and not a sufficient pet shelter.
customer_reviews.author: william l witkowski

customer_reviews.title: The cats are using it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the stray cats I have around my house would not use it. But they are. This was easy to put together. It is easy to take apart also. I like that it has the mat inside. It does keep the cats warm right now. I like that you can remove the doors also.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this house for my outside rescue kitties. I have two adult cats and they both fit in the house and love it! They are nice and warm when they come out of it, even when it is well below freezing outside. I think they would give it 5 stars if they could. :) I don't use the timer, I just keep it plugged in all the time during cold spells. It doesn't use that much electricity. When it warms up some, I just unplug it. Very well made. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: bvmiller

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Gets super warm great for strays!
customer_reviews.text: Love this it’s so cute!! I’m sorry I ordered a different heated house before this and this one is much nicer and the heater works great! I have two ferals that wandered into the yard so now they both have a home and clean food and water! House isn’t jumbo however isn’t as small as mentioned will fit my Maine Coon who weighs 17.5lbs. I would describe it as compact but very effective. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Timer is rated for indoor use only
customer_reviews.text: The timer included is rated for indoor use only. So you cannot use the house outdoors with the timer. If you want to put it on a timer, you will have to buy a separate outdoor rated timer, Or run the cord through your door to the inside of your house.
customer_reviews.author: caroline moore

customer_reviews.title: Very very small
customer_reviews.text: It is cute decorated but man is it small like almost too small for a petite cat. My outdoor kitty was not thrilled and I am not happy for 50$ not worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: emma hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product ... I was thinking of my outdoor cat and how he would fair during cold weather days. I didn't take into account his size... so this house is small and no room to really move for him. Before he could claim it ...our next door neighbors cat "Carlos" took to it so al least someone is using it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great package,outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I really like that its collapsible to bring inside in the summer months. My only criticism is that its supposed to be an outside pet house with heater and timer. If you market it as outdoors, the timer should not be an "indoors only" timer. Now i have to buy another timer thats meant to be out doors....just an update, since my review the seller has mailed a new outdoor timer for the product at no additional cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: mr.green

customer_reviews.title: The doors suck but everything else is grear
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced the old Home Depot box mu cat had her kitten in. She's an outdoor stray we brought to our new house from our old apartment and so far they love it buuuut the doors suck. I notice a lot of people aren't using them. Makes sense since they're designed to be on the inside and attach with velcro. The cat and her kitten can't easily get in and out because it sticks when they get out and the inside is snug as it is and I was hoping they could use the doors because we live in the South with a lot of baby blood sucking mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: Jeroyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed and very useful
customer_reviews.text: It's a pleasure to see a product so well designed and manufactured and so fairly priced. It was quick and easy to assemble. This winter I have been feeding 3-4 outdoor cats around here that don't seem to have a home. I put a dish of food inside the house and the most tame cat of the bunch came in right away during the recent bitter cold nights. The first night I left one of the clear plastic doors off so he would be more inclined to come in, but after that I have left both doors attached and the cat is still using the house. It's a really great product at a very reasonable price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for your outdoor friend!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a stray cat around our home for several months and when the cold winter approached I purchased this little cat house in the hopes of keeping him warm. It has been a couple of months now and the overall quality of this product has exceeded my expectations. It remains plugged in 24/7 and stays warm, never hot, and has been a perfect place for him to get temporary shelter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mats

customer_reviews.title: door flaps-question
customer_reviews.text: Just received this house to use for a feral cat we have outside. She was born at our house last year and returned this winter. I am just wondering about the door flaps, they are nice and thick for the warmth but I am wondering if when she gets inside if she will figure out how to get back out since they are larger than the door itself. Haven't set it out yet hoping to today. House seems very nice and I turned on the heater to test it seems to get nice and warm inside. One on my inside cats climbed in when I walked away from it and didn't want to come back out.
customer_reviews.author: Sony

customer_reviews.title: No heat at all
customer_reviews.text: Heating pad does not get warm at all. Very disappointing. The outdoor feral cat is freezing. Plugged into the wall without the timer for 72 hours straight not a bit of noticeable warmth to my hand. I took it outside nothing. I out on plastic flaps...nothing. heating pad/wired connection/housing is not operating. I do not expect a human-grade therapeutic heating pad element level of heat but I do expect noticeable warmth on my bare hand. I felt nothing. Messaged the company for help on their website contact form. Waiting to see if they respond. I really want this to work. UPDATE..still no response from seller after 2 requests to their website
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is nice, but it was missing the front flap for the door and I have had issues with the heating mat stating warm. I bought this for an outside cat to keep her warm and when the wind and rain can get in and the heater doesn't work all the time it doesn't fully serve the purpose. If the heater worked properly and all of the pieces were included it would have worked better for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Kitty Winter House
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful little heated house solved a BIG problem. My cat that refuses to be in the house is now 16 and skinny. I dreaded winter coming, but I got this and he LOVES it. I was surprised at how quickly he took to it. I did cut the front door into wide vertical slits to make coming out easier. Some complained that it doesn’t get very hot. For me that was a plus. It’s just the right temp to help him maintain his body temp in cold weather and be snug without me worrying about it getting too hot.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: 😻😻😻
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cat house for a feral cat that I've been taken care for outside my house. We already have another outdoor house that we put straws in it but I'm afraid it is still not warm enough in the winter time. It only took my bf to set it up within minutes. The house is super cute and appears to be sturdy, though I'm not sure it will be able to handle blizzard conditions yet, guess we will find out when we get one. But so far, my feral cat loves it and she stays in there most of the time whenever the heating pad is on.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: How to keep him in the house
customer_reviews.text: I think the house is cute. hooked it up the day I got it. It is on my big front porch. I have been putting a dish of canned food in every nite. I see him go in to eat but do not know if he stays very long. It gets dark early and I cant see him . He is a stray cat that is getting very tame and will get on my lap. He wants to come in but I have a little dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This house really does get warm!
customer_reviews.text: This house was easy to put together, looks like good quality and is very cute. We did not use the timer yet as my "wild kitties " are spending the winter in my garage that is temporarily unheated (I hope) as the woodstove broke. Winter is brutal in the north! Had to remove the plastic flap over the door, but kitties moved in immediately! If I buy another house I will buy this one. It is the size for 1 large kitty. (I have another house that fits 2 kitties but part of that floor is not heated.)
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but not sure how it will hold up
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and the heating system seems like it will be great for the winter but they don't tell you it's put together with Velcro and it's kind of a plastic vinyl siding which will be great in rain probably hold up through basic weather but in heavy snow or very windy conditions I could see it blowing away or collapsing with too much snow on top, if it's not somewhere protected. So it's very easy to put together and very cute but you would want to have it somewhere maybe under a roof for stairway or somewhere with a little bit of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kim.Crady

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! My cat loves this house. Our Luna was born wild in the woods. She’s always been so scared of everything. Our whole family doubted she would even go in. She loves it. I put her in with the lid off a couple times and she immediately jumped out then I forced her through the clear flap door to show her it’s an entrance. That’s all I had to do. The last few days she’s stayed in it. I came out last night it was 28•F and she came out and was super warm I held HER for heat. If our part wild stubborn cat loves it yours will definitely. You have to try this product. Thank you PETYELLA!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown and described. Missing safety buckles!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Petyella Heated Outdoor Cat House I have purchased. Loved the first one, but the second one came without the depicted, and described, safety buckles with grommets to tie the house down. The written description says, "There are grommets on tabs at all four corners to secure the house in place if desired." I used the safety buckles to hold the first unit in place on a shelf, but cannot do that for the second house, which is both inconvenient, and dangerous. Disappointing in that I specifically chose this house for those buckles, which other units did not have.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how a full size cat is supposed to get in here and be comfortable. For the price, this thing is way to small for the stray we take care of. Also the door flaps were poorly thought out. They can push them in to get into the house but then the door is stuck inside and they freak out trying to really press on it to get out.
customer_reviews.author: kristina grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This kitty house is really nice. My cats love it! It really does keep them warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Moore

customer_reviews.title: Feral cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my covered patio for a blind, feral cat that we have living in our backyard. I honestly thought it might be difficult to get the cat to use this enclosed pet house, but I was wrong. After assembling it, I put a bowl inside with canned cat food, and the feral cat immediately went inside and ate. Now that the weather is getting colder, he stays inside it most of the time, which tells me he loves it! I now feed him outside the box, but am so glad to know he can sleep safe and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously.. debated on buying this for weeks. Didn’t wanna spend $60 on a cat house for a stray.. but it was SO cold, Buffalo is NOT sympathetic towards strays! Had it not been for this purchase, the stray outside would surely have died. Because I provided this heated home, she is in it all the time and has gained trust for us, and now she eats when we feed her. She was weak, starving, and freezing when we first saw her. Now she is fattened up, healthy, loving, warm, and happy. So worth the money and peace of mind knowing she is warm AND has a place to safely deliver her babies since we recently noticed she is pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: quite nice
customer_reviews.text: This insulated house is the same size as I have purchased from another name brand (that only sells solid color), but this house is much more attractive, just as sturdy, much nicer heating element with a better quality sherpa padding, and too boot it was less expensive! Would definitely recommend this little insulated house year round and for anyone who truly wants to help feral or stray cats but cannot afford so many pricey options. This is very nice quality and easy peasy set up.
customer_reviews.author: LDA

customer_reviews.title: I would not want my cat in the product in a wind storm. The material is just stuffed cloth.
customer_reviews.text: The hole for the cord on the wall of the box is too far from the cord in the pad and you have to curl the cord to get it out of the box. The clear plastic "doors" are only accessible by going into the box. To get out, the cat would have to really push the plastic door to make it open from the inside. Otherwise, you need to leave one of the "doors" off. It does seem to be warm on the inside. I am going to try the box and see if my cat will use it. Cannot image the useful life will be very long.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Tom Kitty gives 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this house for the old feral tom cat that lives in my neighborhood. He LOVES it! Last winter about did him in and I wanted to give him a chance at surviving this winter. It took several weeks of leaving the roof open and both doors off, putting his food in the house before he'd sleep in it. He still won't use it if I put the front door on but it's only a matter of time before he gets accustomed to that. The heated pad must feel like heaven to him. For my part, it was super simple to put together and everything was as advertised. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ARandleman

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service. As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Amendment: The company has great customer service. They mailed me an outdoor timer right away and said they were changing the timers for future orders. Also, I received a letter from the company president. Original review: I bought this to use on my semi sheltered porch in Ohio. The timer for the heating pad in this “outdoor cat house” states it’s for indoor use only. Also I’m not sure this will hold up on windy nights. I am considering returning it
customer_reviews.author: Darnedeb

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and very warm!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two and love them! We have two outside cats and we have the houses on a closed in porch. The houses are great and both cats love them! Our one cat is over 20 lbs. and he fits in very nicely. We were using portable heaters that jacked our electric bill. These use very little electricity and you can put them on a timer, which comes with it. Excellent price, good quality and 5 minute assembly. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: BARB  ERCEG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, warm house for feral cats
customer_reviews.text: This house is suitable for cat size animals. The house assembles easily with all velcro fasteners. There are two “door” openings with clear plastic, removable flaps. Don’t think this house is set up to be in the rain. There is a heated mat that is in a fleece cover. There is also a vinyl padded floor mat. My house was set up initially with no door flaps and no roof installed. Treats were placed inside to lure the cats in. After the cats got used to the house, the vinyl mat was placed on top of the heating pad with an old towel / blanket. Hopefully, the warming mat won’t get saturated by melting snow.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wegman

customer_reviews.title: Worked good the first Winter but.....
customer_reviews.text: I agreed with most things in the reviews, however, the heater lasted about 4 months (1 Winter). Went to plug in this Winter and it does not heat. I noticed they don't sell a replacement heating pad either. Disappointed to only get 12 weeks' use of it. The overall rating dropped to a 1.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this house!
customer_reviews.text: We love this house. The cat went in it after some treating it up inside. Even in Florida we get cold nights and to see him in it out night is so comforting. He's probably the most spoiled feral.. except for my neighbor's feral (his sister) who enjoys her house too. I love that it is so easy to setup and comes with everything you need. I especially love the follow up from Lisa with the tips on getting them into it. Very good product! Thank you Lisa!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Two negatives killed a 5 rating
customer_reviews.text: 1st Negative: Roof did not have velcro sticky strip on one side. Can make do with tape, but will have to redo whenever cleaning is needed. 2nd Negative: A person has to be a genius to determine how to use to heating pad timer. The instructions are woefully inadequate (and I have done a lot of tech writing in my days, so I know a little of which I speak). I'm not even going to try to use it. Other than that, I am really happy with the product and so is our stray outdoor cat who has been with us on our front porch for over a year..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Strong

customer_reviews.title: Ideal solution!
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble with the strong Velcro straps. We bought it to provide some shelter for a stray cat that is very skittish in our neighborhood in upstate NY. We have been feeding him for a couple of months but cannot get him to come inside. He began using the house the very first day we put it out. We sleep much better knowing the poor cat has a place to get warm.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen C. Bagnoli

customer_reviews.title: Good Product & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The cat house is very cute, and easy to assemble. Is is not rain/snow proof, and will do best in a covered area if being placed outside. The electric pad heats up warm to the touch, and the timer is a nice touch for setting just the necessary hours of the day/night to run the heating pad. When our product arrived, it was missing the vinyl door flaps. I messaged the seller, and they responded the same day. By the next week, I'd received the missing door flaps. I am pleased with my purchase & the customer service provided was excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: spinnmama

customer_reviews.title: The cats use it.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the houses. The flaps on each end are very beneficial. These two houses are being used to give two outside cats some place warm at night.
customer_reviews.author: James C Dickerson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy to assemble, well made
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly indoor cat who likes to escape her younger siblings by spending time outside on our patio. We had been using her soft sided carrier with a heating pad but it wasn't waterproof - so a surprise rain made her very stressed. This waterproof heated house is just what we needed. The rain flaps are secured by velcro and easily removed, which is perfect as my cat prefers the front of the house to unobscured. Keeps my kitty warm and dry, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Average. Could assemble better if constructed better.
customer_reviews.text: Average. Some customers may like it. Heated Cat House has some design flaws that need to be corrected. Velcro is very weak and not heavy duty. Should have been a zipper instead of velcro at least on some sides, or should have been snap buttons with a velcro cover. The velcro also doesn't line up properly especially in assembling the roof, and when we finally got the roof attached it was crooked. Only part of the electric cord is shielded and chew proof. We bought a wooden one instead, at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: bsaleem97

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, when they arrived, and I set them up, the timer stated not for outdoor use. Additionally, the heated pad, even if not connected to the timer is not grounded. This was misleading in the advertising for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee Logan

customer_reviews.title: They thought of everything. Awesome cat house!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! Pros: Super cute, heated, warm, 2 exits, chew proof cord. My cat loves it. Cons: Seems more like weather resistant. I would guess heavy snow or rain would take its toll as well as being left exposed to the elements. Kinda small but ok bc it will keep it warmer. Not sure if it will be warm enough when temps go below 40 degrees. The cord does not fit through the metal rivet hole. Overall, definitely recommend this adorable house. My cat wants to go outside more even when it's raining to go in her house. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: It works! My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I sat it in the house for a few days with the roof off of it. I put catnip and treats inside to get my cats used to being inside. I put it outside and put a tarp around the area, just to protect it a little bit more. The cats love it! I wish it was just a bit bigger so they could both go in together. I also clipped up the door so they could get used to the house and not fear the plastic door. I am very happy with the product! I would purchase it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built, innovative velcro ansd canvas design
customer_reviews.text: Have the little house under an enclosed car port on our deck. Three of the ferel cats have found it and are sharing it. We keep the heater on 24/7 and felt good about having it when the temperature dipped to -4 in New Jersey yesterday. By it being on the clear curtained enclosed deck it is well protected from all elements. Delivery was quick and well packaged. A very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: My feral tom cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about an older feral tomcat that I finally was able to befriend. It has been such a cold winter so far. But from the moment I set this house up - and showed him where to go, he claimed it. I have the open end facing my home, away from the elements, but he lays in it so that he can look out the other end. If one of the other cats attempts to check it out, he darts over and lays claim, it's hysterical! Thank you for your creation - and my Hank thanks you!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Porter

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: We get down into the teens. Kitty can be found cuddled up in his heated house. We get high winds so we did cover it with a thick waterproof door mat to keep driving rain out. The Velcro could be stronger but holds together enough to put it together. We had to leave the door off because it can only be pushed in but not out. Cat couldnt figure out how to flip it up from the inside. Overall keeps cat warm enough for kitty to like using it.
customer_reviews.author: yankeedoodle

customer_reviews.title: Needs instructions! Needs ground stakes! For outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be bigger and have instructions!! The plastic door flaps are horrible and come off easily. It needs stakes for the holes to place it in the ground outdoors. Why are there no stakes?? Heater works great. Was going to buy two more but because of the small size and these issues I mentioned I’ll be buying a different brand. It’s cute but for outdoor cats make it a little bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Feral cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: The roof Velcro was a little weak but I tie the house down to it's platform so no real issue. The feral cat that uses it loves it and it definitely keeps him warm and we experience the Polar Vortex in Michigan. I also replaced one of the door flaps with a heavy duty cloth cover which he likes a little better than the plastic flap which gets pretty rigid in the cold. The heated mat stays on constantly so I haven't used the timer yet but will in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a velcro house
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my outdoor cat. Unfortunately he rather chill on my swing porch than in here, not even at night. But the product is pretty good. It was easy to assemble. Everything suck together with the velcro, and the heating pad is a nice touch. It does stay warm, not too hot. I just wish my cat would love it as much as I do. I try to trick him with treats and food inside the house, doesn't work... but I'm not giving up.
customer_reviews.author: Hanh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine anyone putting this outdoors, even in the summer. A slight breeze would probably knock it over. Ended up putting it in the garage for our local outdoor cat. No matter what we tried, she had no interest in trying to go inside...even with food waiting for her. Your mileage may vary with this aspect of the house, but for us, it was a complete bust. The heater? Barely heated anything. If you tried to use it during the winter time, you're going to end up with a cat-Popsicle!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Cat house
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! Kitty was a little nervous and wouldn’t go in, so I only put her bowl of dry food inside the cat house and now we can’t get her out!
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: fast easy construction
customer_reviews.text: Next door neighbor, unfortunately, broke her hip and had to move to sheltered accommodation leaving two cats homeless. I bought this as temperatures here have been brutal .it worked fine for a day and a half just went to check it and if needed to move snow and unfortunately it is no longer heating. I covered it with a tote with a hole cut in to provide waterproofing I will check again in the morning to see if it may just be a loose connection.will update when i can do that.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product! My cat loves it! He's an outdoor cat but typically makes his way into the garage at bedtime and needed something to keep him warm. This cat house is super cute and provides adequate warmth from the concrete floors. The only issue we had are the plastic door flaps...they don't seem to be a correct size for the actual doors. He can get in fine, but cannot push through the flap to get back out as it gets hung on the door opening. Removing them worked for us as he does sleep in the garage, but would worry about no doors if he were using it outside.
customer_reviews.author: murray15

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product was harder to put together than anticipated. Flemsy construction or make sure you are using it on a porch or covered area. There is a portion of the cord that isnt weatherproof so not sure how long it will last exposed to elements outside. The plastic swing doors dont work well and seem to get stuck which scares the kitty. I am disappointed in the quality for the price. You could build a house and buy a warmer like used in chicken coops for cheaper and better construction. The heater doesn't work well either. Igloo cooler with entry hole and blankets would work better too
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Neville

customer_reviews.title: For 50 dollars is it really worth it?
customer_reviews.text: It was a little small and my outdoor cat doesn't use it. But, it is super adorable even has a house number and for an indoor fancy kitty bed it would be perfect. Also doesn't heat up as much as I expected it to
customer_reviews.author: ReReNava

customer_reviews.title: bought 2 houses for outdoor cats
customer_reviews.text: We set these up on our covered back porch thinking our old guys would be leery of using them right away. Well within an hour the old stray was in it, singing at the top of his lungs! The other old guys waited until the next day before making their move, now they are all in the houses, enjoying the heat as we have had a record cold winter and these boys are 12-16 years old. Never too old to learn something new! Wish I had found these sooner. Great deal and it's good to see them enjoying winter for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom, who feeds a feral kitty she has named Obi Wan, but can't bring her inside because of my mother's inside cat is very territorial. Obi absolutely loves it and spends a lot of time inside it, especially when it's chilly out. The only issue was that she won't go in as long as the door is attached because it's a little stiff and she doesn't quite understand that she can get through the entry, but that was easily remedied by removing it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy adorable house
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cute house for one of my feral cats that hangs out on my patio. I wanted him to have a warm bed for the winter. He was curious and has spent some time in there which makes me happy. I was so impressed with the quality of this house. I do have it on my covered patio and would not recommend putting it out in the elements. I appreciated getting an e-mail with instructions on how to acclimate your pet to the house. I am very happy with my purchase and would HIGHLY recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions sent to me by the seller to acclimate my cat to the house and happily left for work this morning seeing her content in the house. The plastic doors are sturdy so a bit stiff so I took off the front door for now. Cat seemed reluctant to push through them. Might cut them down a little so they swing more easily in and out. Overall I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We inherited a cat with our new house so the cat house was purchased for him. I feel a sense of comfort leaving him outside in such a nice warm shelter. The house was quick and easy to put together and I’m so happy for the flaps on both entrances, I’ve heard him fighting another cat on a few occasions so he needs escape routes. Excellent and thoughtfully structured item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pitts

customer_reviews.title: The Purrrr-fect Solution for Our Indoor/Outdoor Cat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 17 year old indoor/outdoor cat, Mr. Murphy just loves this cheerful and functioning Cat House. We have the house sitting atop a small square wooden (folding) table on the front porch near an electrical outlet. It was fun to decorate Murphy's house this past holiday with battery powered Christmas lights attached along the roofline of the house. We received many compliments. Both Mr. Murphy and our family are more than satisfied with this product!!! : )
customer_reviews.author: RCJackman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and sturdy little house! My cats like it inside and out. It is strong enough to not cave in under my biggest cat sitting on the roof, so that is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it but keep it covered when raining
customer_reviews.text: We have a big outdoor cat and she loves this house! Love the heater that has a timer and it’s so cute! Only complaint is the inside gets soaking wet when it rains and it’s even sitting under our deck. I had to get plastic and cover it up so the rain wouldn’t soak the pad inside the house. Highly recommend this house and advise keeping it out of the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm and comfy for our cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed. It was starting to get cold and we either needed to get the cat somewhere to be warm or bring her in the house. We decided to get her this house to try. She went in the house as soon as we put it in the garage and she spends most her time in there. I was prepared to bring her in the house when it got really cold but so far she just wants to be in this house where she is warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality at a Terrific Price
customer_reviews.text: We installed our new heated cat-house on the porch yesterday. It was exactly as advertised. Excellent quality at a great price. As mentioned in some of the other reviews, we removed the doors for now as it is for Boo Boo Kitty, an outside feral kitty who has come to visit us on our porch. Hopefully he/she will enjoy coming in from the cold and lay on the heated pad inside. Waiting to see, as Boo Boo comes for dinner everyday. Very nice product and wish Lisa well in her venture.
customer_reviews.author: Keith the Accountant

customer_reviews.title: Cute little cat house
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for now. Not sure how well it will hold up in extreme weather conditions. It rained last night and kitty didn’t get wet. She loved it! Jumped right in the second I assembled it and placed it on the ground! She only came out to eat and drink water. Looks like love at first sight.
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors too!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together - instructions not needed! Its main purpose is for outdoor use, but it works great indoors as well. My apartment gets really cold in the winter months, and I don’t have a heater, so I’ve tried to make warm spots for my cat inside. This is his favorite over all of the other cat homes and blankets. It’s nice because it makes it warm, rather than hot. The door flaps took him a while to figure out, so you may have to help your cat get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Toropova

customer_reviews.title: Cute little house!
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday and it is the cutest little house.Easy to assemble,takes minutes. Pretty sturdy as well. My cats are a bit suspicious of their new house but I don't doubt they'll be in it all cozy in no time. Sometimes my cats like to sleep outside but at least now if the weather is bad I know they have some shelter to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Quality, cute & the cat is obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute and our cat LOVES it. She was clawing at the door wanting to come in by it’s been soooo cold the past few days and we were having to let her sleep inside. Now she doesn’t even want to come in and is staying in her house purring! She loves it. Easiest assembly ever and came with a super nice timer that was unexpected. Impressed and will always have one and I have friends getting one now!
customer_reviews.author: matthew baugher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my indoor/outdoor cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats are mostly indoor cats, but they like to go outside sometimes. It made me nervous because I worried about them being outside when I wasn't home. I bought this little house and put it on our front porch. The cats love it on a cool morning, and it makes me feel so much better knowing they'd have a place to get out of the rain if they were about when I wasn't home to let them in.
customer_reviews.author: Missie

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: We found this kitten hanging out by our woods towards the end of last summer. We fed her and loved her but she stayed outside. When winter came we decided to bring her in, only to find out that there was an allergy. So, back out she went and we decided to try this. We are so glad that we did. She is the happiest little thing and so are we. She stays dry and warm all winter and has a place to sleep and hide when it is warmer out. We didn't use the timer, it wouldn't work with our outdoor plug.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised - My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and the heating pad works. It is also adorable. :) It was odd that the cord comes out of the heating pad a couple of inches from the end and doesn't match up with the hole in the house for the cord to go through, but easy enough to work around. My husband told me that no cat was going to use such a contraption, and was very annoyed to be proven wrong when our cat started using it the first night!
customer_reviews.author: CyndiH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Two of my cats have been violently fighting really bad lately to the point where one of them refuses to come into the house. She has always preferred beOmg outside anyway but in the winter when it’s too cold outside she comes in at night. Now that she won’t even do that I needed something for her to keep warm while being outside. This house is perfect. The heat pad keeps her nice and cozy and it’s so cute On my front porch. I’m very thankful for this house so my cat doesn’t freeze to death this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shelter for our neighborhood stray cats!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! Weatherproof and (in our case) raccoon-proof since they also seek shelter in this house when the neighborhood stray cats are not in residence. The heated mat is a real plus, and gave us comfort when we could see the stray cats huddled inside when it got super cold outside. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had this thing on in my garage for at least 2 months straight (24 hour heat). It’s cold where I live, I originally bought it for my cat because he goes outside at night a lot... my neighbors cat has taken it over but I don’t mind because they never let him in the house!! Last weekend it was 16 degrees and he stayed in there all night and was just fine. It’s a low heat, very safe. I will most likely be ordering another one for my cat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproofed PERFECTLY. Best for 1 animal.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble, but if you don't pay attention you might miss "which flap is on top." I even recieved an email with how to entice my kittens into it. Unfortunately, it isn't big enough for 4 kittens. But I love that the heat mat is removable and the plastic flap doors are perfect for ferals (you just have to air it out to get rid of the plastic smell 1st, and convince the kittens there's an exit on the other side. Ideally, it's good for 1 cat or small dog (or maybe 3 newborn kittens, after 3-5 months, it's too small for more than 1). It doesn't look tacky, and if assembled correctly, it's completely weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Homie

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and cute too
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Our one stray insisted on sleeping on the open porch instead of in the garage. I had a small heating pad in a bed for him, but that wasn’t good in the wind and frigid cold. We set up this cute and sturdy “ cat house”, plugged it in and Leo has happily Resided in comfort and joy since then. I have peace knowing he is Cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Georga C

customer_reviews.title: Puddin' loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, weather-proof, coyote-proof! My porch cat Puddin' used it all winter and still uses it on some of the rainier nights! It's defensible to wild animals, resists rain, resists wind, and the cord to heat it can slip under your door and across your room to an outlet! It has an aesthetically pleasing design and best of all, it can fit more than one cat! It also comes with a timer so you can set the heater to only come on at night! Definitely recommended for your outdoor or feral kitties!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie DeBruin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof and warm.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint with this outdoor house is that it isn't heavy. A strong wind could easily push it around. Our outdoor cat loves this house. It keeps her warm and dry. She won't come into our house because of our other cats. The plastic swing doors scare her so we keep them off. They are put on with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Careen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things! I have three feral kittens and their Mom. This is perfect for them and gives them shelter from the elements! There’s even a corded insert with a timer for colder weather. The seller even sent me a nice email about it, and reviewed the setup. Delivery was fast and it’s adorable! The kittens took to it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Want2bebythec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and affordable for outdoor warmth
customer_reviews.text: This little outdoor house is exactly what I was looking for to provide shelter and warmth on our porch for a stray kitty we’ve been feeding but not been able to catch. It fits together easily and is nice and sturdy. Velcro holds it together and the timer and heating pad provide a great little warm house! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: fr3ddy1031

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my feral cats in Maryland winter. It's sturdier than it looks on first inspection. It was easy to put together. The cats like it. My only complaint was that the instructions for the timer that comes with it, is like two sentences.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tassin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for outdoor cats
customer_reviews.text: We have an outdoor cat we bought his for. It does work okay but the little plastic door in the front keeps coming off. It is only on with velcro. The timer on the heater is confusing. We didn't know how to use it! Besides that it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Fareeda

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute! Not quite big enough for two full grown cats if they like their own space but perfect for one cat. The heating pad appears pretty weather proof and has a timer so you can set it to turn on only at night and shut off in the morning. This is perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sonieb33

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATED* I have added another star to this review for the sellers amazing customer service. They offered to replace the entire thing for free for my minor complaints. This is a very financially safe purchase, as this seller will stand by their customers. Very impressed. PRODUCT: Some stitching wasn't done correctly on the edges (nothing structural), the timer clearly states "indoor use only" on the packaging. I think that the price a bit high for what you get, but I wouldn't return it. Very easy to assemble using Velcro, no tools required. It will definitely work for my outside cat, but I would prefer the price to be around $60.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. My cat wont get out of it. The doors on both ends are great for easy escape in case something climbs in. It stays nice and warm even when in the teens.
customer_reviews.author: nicky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for feral cats.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I noticed a few feral cats hanging around my shed in the back and started leaving out food for them. Well now that it’s getting cold outside I decided to try and get them a warm place to stay. This house is a little small but the two cats are staying in it. So I’m pleased with it. The week I put it out side we had rain most of the week so I can say without a doubt it is very water proof. I highly recommend this house.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it, flaps aren't ideal
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor cat loves this little house! It's cozy, but big enough for the average kitty. (He's about 9 lbs, with a little guy and has no problem getting in and out. The design is adorable, and I love that the cord is nice and long. Negatives: I had to remove the front flap because the flaps are too big for the opening, so if the cat goes in, they can be a bit trapped if they can't get the flap to swing back out. Good part is that the flaps are velcroed on, so removing was easy. Overall, kitty and I are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Simon

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: Our outdoor stray kitten loves this house and heated pad. He took to it immediately and in the cold temperatures he stays in his house on his warm mat stretched out and cozy. This was super easy to assemble too. I would recommend, and have been recommending this to my cat loving friends.
customer_reviews.author: SW

product_meta.title: PETYELLA Heated cat Houses for Outdoor Cats in Winter - Heated Outdoor cat House Weatherproof - Outdoor Heated cat House - Easy to Assemble
feature_bullets: ✅ THE BEST CAT HOUSE ON THE BLOCK! Our Heated Cat Houses for Outdoor Cats tops the charts in quality, beauty, and innovation. It makes a great water resistant shelter for all cats and dogs under 25 pounds.

✅ HELP IN THE HUMANE EFFORT. Even with their thickened fur coats, feral and stray cats need a warm and insulated shelter to sleep at night. You can feel great knowing you are providing a heated cat bed.
✅ *THE PERFECT GIFT FOR CAT LOVERS! Do you know someone that loves cats? Our Outdoor Cat Shelter makes a thoughtful & unique gift! It can be used in Barns, Porches, Garages, or Balconies!

✅ *KEEP YOUR CATS WARM & DRY: The house comes with a heated pet mat with 1m chew proof cord and 4m extension cord. A plug in timer is also added so you can save time and money. When weather turning colder at night, your cat will love the benefits of having a heated shelter to snuggle up in during the chilly fall and winter months.

✅ *ENJOY OUR 100% “COZY CAT” GUARANTEE— Our premium Heated Cat Houses come with everything you need to protect your cute cat from the elements. If you aren’t happy with your purchase, we will provide you with a full refund! ❗WARNING DO NOT PUT THE HOUSE UNDER THE STARS - RAIN WILL GET THROUGH THE OPENING FLAPS!❗

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
